snippet: A guard at New York City's Rikers Island jail complex was indicted on Monday for failing to keep watch the night a mentally ill, homeless Marine Corps veteran died in a cell with heat topping 100 degrees Fahrenheit (38 degrees Celsius)...

headline.print_headline: NYC Jail Guard Charged in Connection With Inmate's Death
headline.main: NYC Jail Guard Charged in Connection With Inmate's Death

lead_paragraph: A guard at New York City's Rikers Island jail complex was indicted on Monday for failing to keep watch the night a mentally ill, homeless Marine Corps veteran died in a cell with heat topping 100 degrees Fahrenheit (38 degrees Celsius)
